TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileFormatException extends System.FormatException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type FileFormatException = class inherit FormatException interface ISerializable

summary.span: The exception that is thrown when an input file or a data stream that is supposed to conform to a certain file format specification is malformed.

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an input file or a data stream that is supposed to conform to a certain file format specification is malformed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用默认系统消息描述错误，如"的输入的文件或数据流不符合要求的文件格式规范。"This constructor uses a default system message that describes the error, such as "An input file or a data stream does not conform to the expected file format specification." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性的新实例与系统提供的消息的描述错误并包括文件名称，如"文件`sourceUri`不符合要求的文件格式规范。"This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and includes the file name, such as "The file '`sourceUri`' does not conform to the expected file format specification." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 属性初始化使用`sourceUri`参数。The property is initialized using the `sourceUri` parameter.
